description: A tool designed to enable Roblox developers to use professional-grade software engineering tools. (installs EOL release - 0.4.x)
notes: Since that Rojo 0.5.0 is considered stable, this version is now in EOL (End of Life) state.
The Rojo team is therefore no longer offering support for this version of Rojo.
We strongly recommend that you migrate your project to 0.5.x in order to keep up with the most recent updates:
